body:
When it comes to attack ads, Republicans are clearly “Ready for Hillary.”

The Republican National Committee released a 30-second #StopHillary ad on Friday ahead of her official campaign announcement that is expected on Sunday.

The ad features a silhouette of Hillary Rodham Clinton walking through darkness to a lectern. Serenading her are voices bringing up all of the “ghosts” that Republicans expect to haunt her candidacy.

“Hillary Clinton has some explaining to do,” one voice says. 

“She used her personal email account to conduct official business,” another adds.

The Russian reset, sniper fire, Benghazi and Clinton Foundation donations are all featured in the mash-up, which concludes: “This is just par for the course for the Clintons. They’re always a little bit secretive.”

For Mrs. Clinton, facing such ads will also be par for the course before too long.
description: Republicans are clearly “Ready for Hillary,” as a 30-second negative ad points out ahead of Hillary Rodham Clinton’s announcement to run for president.
title: First Draft: Republicans Release ‘Stop Hillary’ Ad Ahead of Announcement
